food.name: Hamburger
food.description: This is a regular hamburger with one patty, pickles, onions, ketchup & mustard, and two buns

food.name: Double Burger
food.description: This is a regular hamburger with two patties, pickles, onions, ketchup & mustard, one slice of American cheese, and two buns

food.name: Cheeseburger
food.description: This is a regular hamburger with one patty, pickles, onions, ketchup & mustard, one slice of American cheese, and two buns

food.name: Double Cheeseburger
food.description: This is a regular hamburger with two patties, pickles, onions, ketchup & mustard, two slices of American cheese and two buns

food.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
food.description: This is a burger with two patties, two slices of cheese, bacon, and two buns

food.name: Fish Burger
food.description: This is a burger with two patties, white pollock with panko breading, tartar sauce, pickles, and two buns
